com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.placement

Class MaxPerRegionRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.placement.MaxPerRule
      • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.placement.MaxPerRegionRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlacementRule

    public class MaxPerRegionRule
extends MaxPerRule
    This rules implements a placement rule for restricting the maximum number of tasks per Region.

      • filter

        public EvaluationOutcome filter(Protos.Offer offer,
                                PodInstance podInstance,
                                java.util.Collection<Protos.TaskInfo> tasks)
        Description copied from interface: PlacementRule
        Returns whether the provided Offer, combined with the accompanying TaskInfos, passes or fails this placement constraint.
        Parameters:
        offer - the offer to be examined
        tasks - the currently deployed tasks in the system, possibly including a duplicate of the task being launched as represented in the offerRequirement. Use PlacementUtils#areEquivalent(TaskInfo, PodInstance) to detect duplicates
        Returns:
        an EvaluationOutcome object describing whether the placement succeeded or failed and why

      • getPlacementFields

        public java.util.Collection<PlacementField> getPlacementFields()
        Description copied from interface: PlacementRule
        Returns the PlacementFields to which this rule applies.
